data_table.description: Lab Assays Processed at Framingham Heart Study Laboratory - Clinic Exam, Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, and Omni 2 Exam 2. Laboratory methods for some variables changed over the course of the exam cycle. Please refer to the protocol (phs4087.v1 l_fhslab_2011_m_0656_protocol.docx) for an explanation. The following measures were obtained: 1) Whole blood - HbA1c, basophil count and percent, eosinophil count and percent, hematocrit, hemoglobin, lymphocyte count and percent, MCH, MCHC, MCV, monocyte count and percent, MPV, neutrophil count and percent, platelet count, RBC, RDW, and WBC; 2) EDTA plasma - total cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, triglycerides, glucose, and post-glucose; 3) Serum - creatinine, albumin, ALT, AST, bilirubin, calcium, CRP, GGT, and phosphorus; 4) albumin and creatinine.

variable.name: shareid
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: UR_ALB
variable.comment: The lower limit of this assay is 3 mg/L. If UR_ALB was below this limit, UR_ALB was set to 3 mg/L and UR_ALB_I was set to 1. Please use UR_ALB_I along with UR_ALB to get the correct subset of data.
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: UR_CREAT
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: HBA1C
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: ALB
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: AST
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: ALT
variable.comment: The lower limit of this assay is 5 U/L. If ALT was below this limit, ALT was set to 5 U/L and ALT_I was set to 1. Please use ALT_I along with ALT to get the correct subset of data.
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: BILI
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: CA
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: PHOS
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: CHOL
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: TRIG
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: GLUC
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: GLUC2
variable.description: Post glucose (two hours post glucose tolerance test beverage taken) (sample type: plasma)
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2
variable.value: Unknown or did not have glucose tolerance test

variable.name: CREAT
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: HDL
variable.comment: The lower limit of this assay is 16 mg/dL. If HDL was below this limit, HDL was set to 16 mg/dL and HDL_I was set to 1. Please use HDL_I along with HDL to get the correct subset of data.
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: CRP
variable.comment: The lower limit of this assay is 0.15 mg/L. If CRP was below this limit, CRP was set to 0.15 mg/L and CRP_I was set to 1. Please use CRP_I along with CRP to get the correct subset of data.
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: WBC
variable.description: White blood count (sample type: whole blood)
variable.comment: Abnormal white blood cell population counts are reliable and were kept in the data. Use WBC_P to determine which observations had abnormal white blood cell populations.
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: RBC
variable.description: Red blood count (sample type: whole blood)
variable.comment: Abnormal platelet population counts are unreliable and were set to missing. Use RBC_P to determine which observations were set to missing because the counts were unreliable.
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: HGB
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.description: Mean corpuscular volume (sample type: whole blood)

variable.name: MCH
variable.description: Mean corpuscular hemoglobulin (sample type: whole blood)

variable.name: MCHC
variable.description: Mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration (sample type: whole blood)
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: RDW
variable.description: Red cell distribution width (sample type: whole blood)
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: PLT
variable.comment: Abnormal platelet population counts are unreliable and were set to missing. Use PLT_P to determine which observations were set to missing because the counts were unreliable.
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2

variable.name: MPV
variable.description: Mean platelet volume (sample type: whole blood)
variable.coll_interval: Generation 3 Exam 2, New Offspring Spouse Exam 2, Omni 2 Exam 2
